title: Autism Society Creating connections for the Autism community to live fully.
author: Vasyl Meleshko
description: We create connections, empowering everyone in the Autism community with the resources needed to live fully.
cleaned_text: An introduction to Autism Spectrum Disorder, prevalence, signs, characteristics, factors, and more. Identifying Autism, related conditions, diagnosis by life stage, and educational evaluations. Explore helpful resources from the Autism community. Stay connected with the latest news and updates from the Autism Society. Learn how to connect and give back to the Autism community. Learn how to take action through the Autism Society's programs and initiatives. This April, join us to #CelebrateDifferences and get involved for Autism Acceptance Month. Learn more about our vaccine education, impact, and gain access to helpful resources for you and your family. The mission, vision, values, guiding principles, and history of the Autism Society. Learn how the Autism Society advocates for meaningful change in the Autism community. Learn about the hearts and minds of the Autism Society's staff and board. 6110 Executive Boulevard Suite 305 Rockville, Maryland 20852 1 (800) 328-8476 info@autism-society.org © 2023 Autism Society Accessibility Tools
